title: Price ReducedWonderful Family HomeParadise on .47 Acre245
text:
Price ReducedWonderful Family HomeParadise on .47 Acre245 ad date: 10/07/2015 
Price ReducedWonderful Family HomeParadise on .47 Acre245 Bertsch Avenue, Crescent City, CA3 bedrooms + large office which could be 4th bedroom. 2 living areas. Loft in detached shop/barn/garage was set up as classroom for home school. This 0.47 acre parcel is bordered by state park land and is set up with chicken coop, large patio and playland. Other features include cyclone fenced area and numerous species of trees. Just minutes to ocean beaches and Smith River Recreation Area. No. 1500201 $315,000Donna Zorn, AgentMing Tree Real Estate1000 Northcrest Dr., Crescent City707-951-0857 or 464-9741, #01221233
